name: Gentle Dental
location: Oregon, Kansas, Oklahoma, Nevada, Arizona, California, Hawaii

primary: Families with children seeking comprehensive dental care
Young adults needing preventative or cosmetic treatments
Adults and seniors managing ongoing dental or oral health concerns
secondary: Referring providers including orthodontists and oral surgeons

brand_mission: Gentle Dental is committed to providing high-quality, affordable dental care in a compassionate environment, helping patients achieve lasting oral health and confident smiles.
slogan: Smile. It's a Gentle Dental thing.
tagline: Gentle on your schedule. Gentle on your wallet.

do: Mention Smile Plan and financing options when relevant
Emphasize preventive care and patient comfort
donot: Use overly clinical or intimidating language
Downplay the importance of dental visits
Use vague claims like 'world-class' or 'state-of-the-art' without context

clinical_strengths: Comprehensive in-house services (e.g., implants, ortho, oral surgery)
Modern technology for diagnostics and treatment
organizational_strengths: Photo-optimized listings and strong local SEO strategy

topic_targeting: Align content topics with seasonal care (e.g., back-to-school dental, summer wisdom teeth), conditions (bad breath, gum disease), or procedures (cleanings, crowns, whitening). Match tone and intent to audience needs.
procedure_language: Use clear, layman-friendly explanations of procedures
Focus on benefits and comfort rather than technical jargon
Mention gentle techniques and pain management

content_preferences.other_preferences: Use strong CTA language for appointments, benefit reminders, and Smile Plan enrollment
